item.title: Embed a Radio4000 with an Iframe, on any website
item.description: From today you can embed your Radio4000 onto any other webpage. MeetÂ RADIO ARKOV. How to use? You need to add to your site the following snippet of code. You will find the right code to be copied at the bottom of every Radio4000 radio page. You can customize the values in pixels of `width` and `height` of this `iframe` HTML element to suit your design needs. If you look closer, you will see the part in the `src` property, ending with `?
